content.raw: Huh I’ve set the test up, creating two cameras with identical pose and parameters but call SetCrop\(false\) on one of them, yet the image comparisions show there is no difference in the images. I’ve confirmed in gdb that their distortionScales are different, but the images coming in are the same. Any ideas?
content.html: Huh I’ve set the test up, creating two cameras with identical pose and parameters but call SetCrop(false) on one of them, yet the image comparisions show there is no difference in the images. I’ve confirmed in gdb that their distortionScales are different, but the images coming in are the same. Any ideas?
